item.title: Pawn Structure
item.author: Author
item.description: Knowning which pawn structure is “weak” is not enough: one need to know how to attack them, or making use of the weaknesses. In general, the formular to attack weak pawns(isolated, backward) is to control the square in front of the pawn so it can’t advance. (the squares are usually weak since no pawn can defend it). Then pile up on the weakness. Every structure has its pros and cons.
